  • Constructor Details

    • PiratesState

      public PiratesState(Card pirates)
      Constructor for the PiratesState class. Initializes the state with the provided Pirates card.
      Parameters:
      pirates - the Card instance representing a Pirates card. This parameter is used to set the state and associate it with a specific Pirates card.
